class models.Truck(load, route)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to represent a Delivery Truck

load¶

A list of package that the truck need to delivery

Type

list

route¶

The list of stops the truck needs to travel to in order

Type

list

miles_traveled¶

The total amount of miles the truck traveled

Type

float

speed¶

The speed of the truck

Type

int

add_miles_traveled(miles: float):

Adds miles to the truck’s miles_traveled attribute

calculate_time_traveled(miles_traveled):

Calculated the amount of time it took to travel the miles_traveled

reload_truck(load, route):

reloads truck with a new load and route if the truck has another load to delivery

deliver_package():

delivers all the packages in the load to their destination

load_truck(load):

Once the load is on the truck, the packages status are changed

add_miles_traveled(miles: float)[source]¶

Adds miles to the truck’s miles_traveled attribute. The runtime is O(1)

Parameters

miles (float) – miles traveled to add to total

calculate_time_traveled(miles_traveled)[source]¶

Calculated the amount of time it took to travel the miles_traveled. The runtime is O(1).

Parameters

miles_traveled (float) – The total amount of miles the truck traveled

Returns

time_traveled – Time it took to travel the miles_traveled

Return type

int

deliver_package()[source]¶

Delivers all the packages in the load to their destination.

classmethod load_truck(load)[source]¶

Once the load is on the truck, the packages status are changed.

Parameters

load (list) – A list of package that the truck need to delivery

Returns

load – Returns the list with packages

Return type

list:

reload_truck(load, route)[source]¶

Reloads truck with a new load and route if the truck has another load to delivery. The runtime is O(n).

Parameters

  • load (list) – A list of package that the truck need to delivery

  • route (list) – The list of stops the truck needs to travel to in order
